tag_list: scott-dudelson, virtual-currency, rewards, loyalty-programs, swagbucks, swag-bucks, prodege, vp, sales, strategic-partnerships
overview:
Eron Zehavi is an entrepreneur, Vice President of Sales and Strategic Partnerships of Prodege, LLC, and CEO of Prodege-owned Froobi, LLC. His primary role is to oversee the Rewards Ecosystem of Swagbucks.com, the web’s premier rewards community.

Prior to spearheading Swagbucks.com, Zehavi applied his talents to MiLB, working with both the Oakland A’s and Milwaukee Brewers organizations. Most recently he was the Director of Marketing for the Stockton Ports, where he was in charge of all television, print, radio, and grassroots advertising and marketing; created and implemented the full promotional calendar; oversaw the in-stadium promotion and entertainment; and worked extensively with corporate partners and sponsorships.

After receiving his B.A. in Cinema & Television Arts from California State University, Northridge, Zehavi focused on writing and creative development in the entertainment industry with brands such as National Lampoon and the Laugh Factory. His passion for creation and innovation has stayed with him throughout his professional career
